entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
